name: Im-Pong-Sibble C3 Edition
description:
Install instructions

Step-by-step guide on how to play Im-Pong-Sibble

Windows:

- Download the ".rar" archive from the website

- Move the ".rar" archive to any folder you'd like to have the game in

- Use WinRar to unarchive the file

- Go into the folder WinRar has just created

- Double-click the file called "Im-Pong-Sibble - C3 Edition.exe"
